release.bugfix: Internal GeoJSON data are now saved as doubles
BrAPI improvements and optimizations
BrAPI imports no longer always include "TEST" entry types
Improvements for Canon integration

release.new: Traits list now includes individual trait pages with options that are adjustable on a per trait basis
Traits include an option to enable repeated measures
Traits include an option to automatically switch to the next entry when data is input
Traits include an option to choose a specific resource image that will be displayed in Collect
Numeric traits include an option to ask if outlier values should be allowed
Numeric traits include an option to limit decimal places for values
Numeric traits include an option to disable the math symbol buttons
Date traits include an option to convert between date and day of year
Categorical traits include an option to collect multiple categories
Categorical traits imported via BrAPI include an option to display either the label or value
Traits can now be renamed with previous names appearing in a list
BrAPI sync and export are now merged into a single screen
BrAPI server compatibility can now be viewed in the BrAPI settings
release.info: Multicat trait format removed
Removed the following settings (moved to traits): day of year, BrAPI label/value, enable repeated measures
Copy, edit, and deleting traits is now within each individual trait
Images can now be skipped during BrAPI export
release.bugfix: Date trait calendar now uses the correct day of year setting
BrAPI authorization redirect link updated
BrAPI now redirects and opens Field Book when authorizing

release.info: New BrAPI import now only displays active trials and studies
release.bugfix: GoPro no longer disconnects after image capture
BMS studies now correctly import via BrAPI
Numerous bug fixes and enhancements
GoPro preview is no longer blank on certain devices
GoPro Hero 13 no longer causes a crash
Reduced installer size by using a different ffmpeg library

release.info: Field Book now supports 16 KB page sizes
release.bugfix: Bug fixes and enhancements

release.new: Fields can now be grouped and archived
New trait formats: Stopwatch, Nix, Greenseeker, Scales
Trait name wrapping in Collect can now be toggled with a long-press
GoPro cameras can now optionally send just the image name instead of transferring the entire image
release.info: Field Book now targets Android SDK 36
Field Creator updated with new workflow and UI
Trait arrows are now hidden if only one trait is active
Boolean traits now have an unset state
release.bugfix: Improved workflow for logging out of BrAPI
Settings are no longer reset on restart
New traits from BrAPI now appear at the end of the trait list
Long pressing image and spectral thumbnails now displays metadata dialog
Importing traits from BrAPI without trait details no longer leads to a crash
Repeated measures no longer ignore trait limits
Keyboard backspace no longer moves cursor to the end of the current value in text traits
Field name is no longer an option in the Collect Search dialog
Exif user comment tag no longer populated by incorrect data
Return character setting is now interpreted correctly
Observation Variable Name is now searchable in the BrAPI trait importer
Image file name sanitation now removes or replaces more characters
BrAPI Sync improved to avoid observation miscounts and other failures
0x00 character now removed from pasted text values

release.new: New option to disable progress bars in Collect
release.bugfix: BrAPI min/max values are now imported correctly
MLKit library no longer causes crashes on certain devices
Trait indicator icons in Collect now resize as expected
Device dark mode no longer affects Field Book UI
Traits with quotes now export correctly in table format
Date traits using day of year now correctly saves
Fixed an issue with Settings search

release.new: Data grid updated with new interface
Device name can now be customized in Profile Settings
User names are now saved in a list for rapid switching
release.bugfix: Improvements for the GoPro Hero 9

release.new: Additional attributes are now included when importing fields using BrAPI
release.info: Improvements to the trait import and creation process
Angle trait animation has been reversed
release.bugfix: Nearest field snackbar no longer overlaps add field button
BrAPI Import background color is now white
Bundled media is now exported as expected for active and existing traits
Exporting with 'Only unique identifier' no longer shifts data
Field imports from BrAPI now include the correct metadata

release.new: Primary/Secondar Order are no longer required when importing files
Labels between entry arrows can be swapped in Collect via new dialog
New or edited data values are now italicized
Settings can be shared between devices using Nearby Share
New Angle trait that uses device accelerometer
Barcode attribute can now be selected on a per field basis
Incoming photos can now be cropped
release.info: Date trait layout modified to match other formats
Audio trait layout modified to display more information
Quick GoTo setting removed and functionality moved to separate dialog that's enabled by default
release.bugfix: GNSS trait no longer resets connection when moving between entries
Manual trait order no longer reset when leaving screen
Preferences are now correctly imported from database zip files
BrAPI authorization fix for specific devices

release.new: Access full add field menu via long-press
geo_coordinates are now pulled in via BrAPI
release.bugfix: Replaced ffmpeg library with local version
Numerous bug fixes and enhancements
Numerous bug fixes and enhancements

release.new: Search box added to field list
release.info: BrAPI export no longer crashes when authentication token is expired
release.bugfix: Numerous bug fixes and enhancements

release.info: Swap navigation now changes position of entry/trait navigation instead of only behavior
release.bugfix: Improved warnings for missing or corrupted storage directory
Barcodes scanned for data entry are now correctly checked for valid values
Percent traits imported via BrAPI without min and max values default to 0/100

release.new: Trial name included in BrAPI import and field details page
Image EXIF tag metadata includes the device pitch, roll, and yaw at the time of capture
Setting added to reset preferences to default
release.info: Fields with different BrAPI study IDs can now have the same name
release.bugfix: Min and max values now correctly saved for BrAPI traits
Label print observations are now assigned to the correct entry when navigating before the print is complete
Improved database export messaging
Go to ID dialog now has cursor focus when opened

release.new: Accession number now included for germplasm imported via BrAPI
Option added at trait creation to keep keyboard closed when navigating to text traits
Proximity check added to disable GeoNav when away from field
Experimental setting to use media keys for entry/trait navigation and picture capture
release.info: Fields and traits that have already been imported are now hidden on the BrAPI import screen
Long-pressing delete button on bottom toolbar will remove all observations for that trait
Current time now used as lastSyncedTime when downloading Observations via BrAPI
lastSyncedTime updated after creating/updating Observations
Improved support for BrAPI servers not using https
release.bugfix: "observation_time_stamp" and "last_synced_time" now correctly saved in DAO
Synced and updated records now correctly identified

release.new: Fields list updated to include bulk actions and individual field pages
Data statistics added to each field
App-wide statistics added to main screen
Trait progress bar in Collect now shows individual traits
Documentation updated
App intro and setup process
Camera expanded with embedded preview
Preferences reorganized and better described
InfoBars updated to support wrapping and prefix replacement
release.bugfix: GoPro, USB, and Canon camera improvements
Numerous bug fixes

release.new: Updated trait creator
Updated Photo trait for devices without camera app (Boox Palma)

Long press on observations to see metadata
release.info: Beta settings renamed to Experimental
release.bugfix: Numerous bug fixes

release.new: Progress bar in Collect screen
Person now required by default
Coordinate format modified to match ISO (longitude; latitude)

Field name visible in InfoBars

New setting to adjust polling rate, angle, and GNSS device
Use internal GPS with GNSS trait
Fields can be sorted to allow for different collection orders
